mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CH_CODE_MT ORDER BY GRP_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CH_CODE_MT (GRP_CODE, CODE_NM, RMK, CR_DT, CR_ID) VALUES (#{grpCode}, #{codeNm}, #{rmk}, NOW(), 'SYSTEM')
INSERT INTO CH_CODE_DT (GRP_CODE, CODE, CODE_NM, RMK, REF, REF1, REF2, CR_DT, CR_ID) VALUES (#{GRP_CODE}, #{CODE}, #{CODE_NM}, #{RMK}, #{REF}, #{REF1}, #{REF2}, now(), 'SYSTEM')
mapper.update: UPDATE CH_CODE_DT SET CODE_NM =#{CODE_NM} , RMK =#{RMK} , REF =#{REF} , REF1 =#{REF1} , REF2 =#{REF2} , UP_ID = 'SYSTEM', UP_DT = now() WHERE GRP_CODE = #{GRP_CODE} AND CODE = #{CODE}
